database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS - Microbes from Bayley Hazen Blue Cheese
entry.description: Interactions between microbes isolated from cheese, isolation information can be found here: Title: Cheese Rind communities provide tractable systems for in situ and in vitro studies of microbial diversity Authors: Wolfe, BE; Button, JE; Santarelli, M; Dutton, RJ Journal: Cell, 2014, Accepted
